Package controller

Class ControllerMandelbrot

java.lang.Object
controller.ControllerMandelbrot
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener, ChangeListener
public class ControllerMandelbrot extends Object implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, ActionListener, ChangeListener
Controller responsible for handling user interactions such as mouse dragging for zooming.

  • Constructor Summary

    Wires the model, view panel, and UI controls together and registers listeners.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerMandelbrot

      public ControllerMandelbrot(ModelMandelbrot model, MandelbrotPanel panel, JSpinner iterationSpinner, JButton resetButton, JButton undoButton, JButton redoButton, JButton saveButton, JButton loadButton, JComboBox<String> colourMapCombo)
      Wires the model, view panel, and UI controls together and registers listeners.
      Parameters:
      model - backing Mandelbrot model
      panel - display panel to update and listen to
      iterationSpinner - spinner controlling max iterations
      resetButton - button to reset the view
      undoButton - button to undo the last view change
      redoButton - button to redo the last undone change
      saveButton - button to save the current state
      loadButton - button to load a saved state
      colourMapCombo - combo box listing available colour maps
